title: #380: Julian Assange, The Mockingbird Media and the Censorship of Truth To Power with Jimmy Dore
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back the Political Powerhouse Jimmy Dore to the show to discuss what is happening to Julian Assange, why the Mainstream Media is silent and why there are no heroes in left in Hollywood. Thank you so much for your support.

See me do stand up:
Cleveland: Oct 23rd: Hilarities 9:30pm show
www.pickwickandfrolic.com/2020/06/sam_tripoli/

Philly: Nov 12th-14th: Philadelphia Helium
https://philadelphia.heliumcomedy.com/events/40847

St. Louis: Dec 3rd-5th St. Louis Helium
https://st-louis.heliumcomedy.com/events/40694

Please check out Jimmy Dore's Youtube Channel:
https://www.youtube.com/thejimmydoreshow

See Sam Tripoli on TV:
Oct 18th: The Comedy Store Docuseries on Showtime
